Welcome to aquarius_webportal's documentation!
==============================================

Python code to get data from implementations of Aquarius Web Portal

Install in the normal way with ``pip install aquarius_webportal``

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

MIT License.

The project's homepage is at https://github.com/kinverarity1/aquarius_webportal
